dmca.title: Cease & Desist - vBulletin.org
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

Re: vbulletin.org

It has come to our attention that you are permitting your users to publish libelous content on vbulletin.org in direct breach of our rights under laws against defamation.

You have 1 week (7 Days) to remove the offending posts and threads, listed below, and confirm in writing to the address at the head of the letter that you will take action to remove these posts and threads in the future:

http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=135673
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=111011
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=129439
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=112164
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=117766
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=135542
http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=135784

Failing this, we will apply for an injunction, and will also seek to recover costs and damages (plus interest) for your negligence in dealing with tortious acts and conduct.

This is our final communication to you on this matter, and we look forward to hearing from you as a matter of urgency.

Yours faithfully
[Private]
